summary: WHILE TRAVELLING ON A STRAIGHT PAVED CITY STREET, THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY PULLED TO THE RIGHT, STRIKING AND GOING OVER A CURB AND ONTO A SIDEWALK (THERE WERE NO PEDESTRIANS).  THE DRIVER WAS THE ONLY OCCUPANT.  DAMAGE OCCURRED TO THE RIGHT FRONT WHEEL AND SUSPENSION AND ALSO BENT THE ALUMINUM FRAME, CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO BE "TOTALED".  THE INJURY WAS MINOR LEG SCRAPES.  *TR
